Dear Hagop and Lorena, 

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

We kindly ask for your support in obtaining an exceptional approval to proceed with the attached scope of work in our store. Our documents will take a couple of weeks to be renewed and we’ve been waiting for the necessary permits for an extended period of time. It is crucial for us to move forward and finalize the work before the busy season and mainly installing the refill machine as it will help us drive more traffic to our store and foster customer loyalty as well as will help us reduce the waste and contribute towards saving the planet. 

 

Your prompt attention to this matter would be greatly appreciated. 

 

Warm Regards,

Abir

 

ABIR ELMIR​​​​

We kindly ask for your support in obtaining an exceptional approval to proceed with the attached scope of work in our store.
